entry.title: WIND WARNING , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 1:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: E 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
